overview:
InText.net is one of the fastest growing contextual advertising networks in the industry, providing relevant and high-quality PPC in text advertising solutions for advertisers and affiliates.

Advertisers can buy top performing traffic from content related web sites and blogs for as low as $0.05 PPC with RON campaigns. InText.net offers complete customization options with multiple underlining schemes and 5 high impact in text ad units. Advertisers can choose keyword or category targeting to create the most effective ad campaign to achieve high conversions and an increase in ROI.

Affiliates can place InText ads in their content to earn money without having to sacrifice any valuable website real estate. InText.net affiliates also have complete control over where the ads will be placed with the dynamic site submission wizard.

InText.net is incredibly proud to be the only advertising network in the industry to offer a referral program for both affiliates and advertisers. Along with the traditional affiliate and advertiser referral programs, each affiliate will be signed up for the advertiser referral program. With that click, the affiliate hosting the ad unit will earn a 5% referral commission for the life of the future advertiser!
